entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Snow ending late this evening then mainly cloudy. Local blowing snow early this evening. Amount 2 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming west 20 gusting to 40 early this evening. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Clearing. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Clearing in the morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 23 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 18 with temperature rising to minus 9 by morning.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 18 with temperature rising to minus 9 by morning. Wind chill minus 25 in the evening. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 26 January 2023
